text: When I notice opportunities to create income, I recognize them and choose to actively work and generate instead.
During moments when I could wait for income, I notice it and choose to create and work actively instead.
When I feel the pull to wait passively for money, I notice it and choose to create income actively instead.
I let not being able to create income prevent me from actively working to generate money instead of waiting.
When I notice myself waiting for income, I recognize it and choose to shift to creating and generating instead.
I see when income needs to be created, and I choose to work actively and generate instead of waiting passively.
When I feel the urge to expect money passively, I notice it and choose to create income actively instead.
I let not identifying income creation opportunities prevent me from actively working to generate money effectively.
When I notice myself creating income actively, I recognize it and choose to maintain those generating patterns.
I recognize when income comes from waiting rather than creating, and I choose to shift to active generation instead.
When I feel the pull to wait for money to come, I notice it and choose to create and work actively instead.
I let problems from waiting for income prevent me from maintaining active income creation and generation.
When I notice active income creation working, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those generating patterns.
I see when I need to generate income, and I choose to work actively and create instead of waiting passively.
When I feel the urge to expect money passively, I notice it and choose to create income actively instead.
I let not being able to create income prevent me from maintaining active work and generation instead of waiting.
When I notice myself maintaining active income creation, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those patterns.
I recognize when income needs to be created, and I choose to work actively and generate instead of waiting.
When I feel the pull to wait passively for money, I notice it and choose to create income actively instead.
I let not identifying income creation abilities prevent me from actively working to generate money instead of waiting effectively.
